miapi.ui.craft.result_equal_warning: Crafting does not change the Item.
miapi.application_target.description.hur: victims when you attack with this item.
miapi.stat.tipped.description:
Applies potion effects. Scroll to see every potion effect.
üß™: The effect applied.
‚åö: The duration.
üó°: The amplifier.
üéØ: The entity the effect is applied to.
miapi.stat.back_stab.description: Multiplier if the Attacker is behind the Victim
miapi.stat.flexibility.description:
The Modability of the Item
 Items with Flexibility below 0
 cant be crafted
miapi.stat.shield_break.description: Time an attack disables a Victims Shield in seconds
miapi.stat.reach.description: Distance in which blocks can be broken
miapi.stat.attack_range.description: Distance in witch one can attack a Target
miapi.stat.projectile_piercing.descripti: Armor Piercing of the arrow, every 5 levels it can pierce a Entity
miapi.stat.mining.level.pickaxe.descript: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Stone
miapi.stat.mining.level.axe.description: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Wood
miapi.stat.mining.level.shovel.descripti: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Sand
miapi.stat.mining.level.hoe.description: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Hay Bales
miapi.stat.water_drag.description: How fast the arrow slows underwater, higher is better
miapi.stat.air_drag.description: How fast the arrow slows in air, higher is better
miapi.stat.bow_draw_time.description: Bow Draw time, lower is better
miapi.module.empty.name: Empty Slot
miapi.module.empty.description: An Empty module slot, can be used to add a module to.
miapi.module.blade_dagger.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Dagger
miapi.module.blade_dagger.description: A common blade head, often used by thieves and scoundrels.
miapi.module.blade_greatsword.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Greatsword
miapi.module.blade_greatsword.descriptio: A massive two-handed sword used for heavy strikes.
miapi.module.blade_katana.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Katana
miapi.module.blade_katana.description: A traditional Japanese sword known for its sharpness and precision.
miapi.module.blade_naginata.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Naginata
miapi.module.blade_longsword.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Longsword
miapi.module.blade_longsword.description: A versatile and balanced sword that offers a good balance between speed and power.
miapi.module.blade_rapier.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Rapier
miapi.module.blade_rapier.description: A slender and agile sword designed for thrusting attacks and quick maneuvers.
miapi.module.blade_sword.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Sword
miapi.module.blade_sword.description: A classic and versatile sword used by warriors across various cultures.
miapi.module.blade_throwing_knife.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Throwing Knife
miapi.module.blade_throwing_knife.descri: A small and lightweight knife designed for throwing with accuracy.
miapi.module.blade_sickle.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Sickle
miapi.module.blade_sickle.description: A small Sickle head. There might be some symbolism.
miapi.module.blade_scythe.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Scythe
miapi.module.blade_scythe.description: A long Scythe head. Usually used to cut grass or People down
miapi.module.blade_scythe.short_descript: A Scythe Blade, a mixture between Tool and Weapon
miapi.module.guard_katana.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Katana Guard
miapi.module.guard_katana.description: A guard specifically designed for use with a katana sword.
miapi.module.guard_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Normal Guard
miapi.module.guard_normal.description: A standard guard suitable for most sword types.
miapi.module.guard_slim.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Slim Guard
miapi.module.guard_slim.description: A slender guard that reduces weight and allows for quicker strikes.
miapi.module.guard_winged.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Winged Guard
miapi.module.guard_winged.description: A guard with decorative wing-like extensions for aesthetic appeal and improved balance.
miapi.module.pommel_cross.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Cross Pommel
miapi.module.pommel_cross.description: A pommel featuring a cross-shaped design for added grip and aesthetics.
miapi.module.pommel_round.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Round Pommel
miapi.module.pommel_round.description: A spherical pommel that provides a balanced weight distribution and comfortable grip.
miapi.module.pommel_spike.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Spike Pommel
miapi.module.pommel_spike.description: A pommel featuring a spike-like protrusion for increased piercing capability.
miapi.module.handle_polearm.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Polearm Handle
miapi.module.handle_polearm.description: A long handle suitable for polearm weapons, providing reach and leverage.
miapi.module.handle_tool.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Tool Handle
miapi.module.handle_tool.description: A sturdy handle designed for tool-like weapons, offering durability and functionality.
miapi.module.handle_long.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Long Handle
miapi.module.handle_long.description: A longer handle ideal for two-handed swords, providing increased reach and leverage.
miapi.module.handle_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Normal Handle
miapi.module.handle_normal.description: A standard-sized handle suitable for most sword types.
miapi.module.handle_short.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Short Handle
miapi.module.handle_short.description: A shorter handle suitable for one-handed swords, providing improved maneuverability.
miapi.module.handle_twin.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Twin Handle
miapi.module.handle_twin.description:
Am impractical Twin Handle for Double the Blades.
 Looks cool though.
miapi.module.axe_front.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Axe
miapi.module.axe_front.description: A front part of an axe used for cutting and stripping wood. Can also be used for combat.
miapi.module.axe_back.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Axe
miapi.module.axe_back.description: A back part of an axe used for cutting and stripping wood. Can also be used for combat.
miapi.module.axe_back.short_description: An axe Head for the other side
miapi.module.pickaxe_front.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Pickaxe
miapi.module.pickaxe_front.description: A front part of a pickaxe used for breaking and mining blocks.
miapi.module.pickaxe_back.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Pickaxe Butt
miapi.module.pickaxe_back.description: A back part of a pickaxe used for prying and chipping.
miapi.module.shovel.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Shovel
miapi.module.shovel.description: A tool with a broad scoop used for digging and moving earth.
miapi.module.tool_back.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Tool Butt
miapi.module.tool_back.description: A back part of a tool used for balancing the weight of the tool head.
miapi.module.hoe_front.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Hoe
miapi.module.hoe_front.description: A front part of a hoe used for tilling soil.
miapi.module.blade_spear.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Spear
miapi.module.blade_spear.description: A front part of a spear used to stab people.
miapi.module.blade_trident.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Trident
miapi.module.blade_trident.description: A Trident Head, sometimes also called a Fork.
miapi.module.arrow_head_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Arrow Head
miapi.module.arrow_head_normal.descripti: The Front piece of an arrow, determins how an Arrow Impacts a Target.
miapi.module.arrow_head_custom.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Arrow Head
miapi.module.arrow_head_custom.descripti: A custom arrow Head, highly dependant on the used Material.
miapi.module.arrow_shaft_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Arrow Shaft
miapi.module.arrow_shaft_normal.descript: Shaft of an arrow, determins weight speed and impact of an Arrow
miapi.module.arrow_fletching_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Arrow Fletching
miapi.module.arrow_fletching_normal.desc: Fletching of an arrow, Impacts the flight characteristics of an Arrow
miapi.module.arrow_fins_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Arrow Fins
miapi.module.arrow_fins_normal.descripti: Fins for an arrow, allows the arrow to travel better underwater
miapi.module.bow_handle_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Bow Parts
miapi.module.bow_arms_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Bow
miapi.module.bow_arms_normal.description: The Arms of a Bow, impacts the draw behaviour of the Bow
miapi.module.bow_arms_long.name: Long [translation.[material.translation]]Bow
miapi.module.bow_arms_long.description: Long Bow, the most powerfull bow, sacrificing accuracy for raw power
miapi.module.bow_arms_recurve.name: Recurve [translation.[material.translation]]Bow
miapi.module.bow_arms_recurve.descriptio: Recurve Bow arms, aimed to provide a balance between power and accuracy
miapi.module.bow_arms_short.name: Short [translation.[material.translation]]Bow
miapi.module.bow_arms_short.description: Short arms, quick draw time, but not that powerfull
miapi.module.bow_string_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Bow String
miapi.module.mattock.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Mattock
